duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform mechanical repairs and maintenance on electric, diesel, and gasoline industrial trucks and construction equipment.
Inspect equipment and diagnose malfunctions to provide accurate repair solutions.
Communicate with customers to explain repair needs and completed work.
Maintain safety compliance and follow established protocols for equipment repair.
Manage time effectively and complete paperwork accurately and in a timely manner.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate or General Education Degree (GED)
